name: cypress-web-api-testing
description: Cypress Web and API Testing Framework

scripts.report:generate:web: marge reports/combined.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename index --inline --charts --reportTitle "Web UI Test Results"
scripts.report:generate:api: marge reports/combined.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename index --inline --charts --reportTitle "API Test Results"
scripts.report:generate:all: marge reports/combined.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename index --inline --charts --reportTitle "Web and API Test Results"
scripts.test:web: npm run cleanup && npm run cy:run:web && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate:web
scripts.test:web:spec: npm run cleanup && cypress run --config-file cypress.config.ts --env type=web --spec && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate:web
scripts.test:api: npm run cleanup && npm run cy:run:api && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate:api
scripts.test:api:spec: npm run cleanup && cypress run --config-file cypress.config.ts --env type=api --spec && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate:api
scripts.test:all: npm run cleanup && npm run cy:run:all && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate:all
